external_games.name: Furry Shakespeare: The Reverse Hamlet Championships

name: Furry Shakespeare: The Reverse Hamlet Championships
storyline: Tybalt is the reigning champion of the local arcade, and no arcade game is better than Reverse Hamlet. It's an outlawed video game about trying to assassinate King Claudius. Why would King Claudius want something like that outlawed?
summary: Partake in an underground arcade game competition. It's gonna be so cool.
